name: Explore Mekong Delta By Bike Tour 3Days
description: Cycling tour on country roads in Mekong Delta region (Mekong Delta tours), the peaceful countryside landscapes of the southern provinces have attracted local and international travelers to the Mekong Delta region for many years. A leisurely day can be spent rowing through the canals in small boats, watching the daily life of local people and visiting orchards to taste the typical fruits of the region.Recently some tour operators have introduced bicycle tours in the area, giving travelers, especially those from abroad, more options to explore the daily life of the locals by cycling through villages and paddy fields in the region. Among those tour providers, Green Trail Tours has designed some bicycle tours to the Mekong Delta region especially for expats and international travelers. Here are the details of these tours.
